subject: Assaults
Hockey, Ice
Colleges and Universities
Sex Crimes
lead_paragraph: Corey Trivino, a Boston University center and the leading goal scorer in the Hockey East conference, was thrown off the team after he was arrested Sunday on charges of indecent assault and battery.
snippet: Corey Trivino, a Boston University center and the leading goal scorer in the Hockey East conference, was thrown off the team after he was arrested Sunday on charges of indecent assault and battery.
